Outdated Stream Deck Make sure you’re using the latest version of Stream Deck.

Wrong IP/port If you press ‘Connect’ in your StreamDeck and can only see a black/green screen, it means it hasn’t established a successful connection to the Receiver. The reason can be a wrong IP address/port, VPN or something else blocking the port.

Wrong or corrupted deck files You can find your config.ini files in one of these locations:

  • lioranboard/LioranBoard Receiver
  • C:/user/%username/appdata/local/lioranboard

Make sure your config.ini files are not skipping any numbers in the names. If you have configs1.ini and configs3.ini, you also need to have configs2.ini.
